scripts.build-webpack-logbase-userconsole-prod: node --max_old_space_size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --env PRODUCT=logbase --env STAGE=prod --mode production --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.upload-bucket-logbase-userconsole-prod: npm run build-webpack-logbase-userconsole-prod && aws s3 cp ./dist s3://userconsole.datamplan.com-logbase/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.js" --include "*.map" --include "*.css" --include "*.ico" --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.build-webpack-logbase-userconsole-dev342: node --max_old_space_size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --env PRODUCT=logbase --env STAGE=dev342 --mode development --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.upload-bucket-logbase-userconsole-dev342: npm run build-webpack-logbase-userconsole-dev342 && aws s3 cp ./dist-dev342 s3://userconsole.datamplan.com-logbase-dev342/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.js" --include "*.map" --include "*.css" --include "*.ico" --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
